column1:
A research team in Wuhan identified a new virus from the coronavirus family responsible for the likes of SARS and MERS. While the virus is new in humans, researchers have been quick to control & analyze it, though risk of outbreak is possible.

https://www.wired.com/story/chinas-swift-id-of-a-new-virus-is-a-win-for-public-health/ … (via WIRED)
